channel.title: Pandoc Guide - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Pandoc Used for converting file formats https://ins3cure.com/pandoc-on-rhel-8/ Go to https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases/latest, download the latest tarball (currently pandoc-2.17.0.1-linux-64.tar.gz) and run: sudo tar xvzf pandoc-2.17.0.1-linux-64.tar.gz --strip-components 1 -C /usr/local/install TeX to be able to generate PDF output: sudo yum -y install texliveBasic useage pandoc inputfile -f inputfiletype -t outputfiletype -o outputfileConvert full folder for f in *; do pandoc "$f" -s -o "../bloghtml/${f%}.html"; doneConvert epub to markdown and migrate to Obsidian Run pandoc bookname.
